abstract: Swedish Orphan Biovitrum, which makes the ReFacto AF treatment for hemophilia for Pfizer, received a preliminary offer from an undisclosed suitor.
snippet: Swedish Orphan Biovitrum, which makes the ReFacto AF treatment for hemophilia for Pfizer, received a preliminary offer from an undisclosed suitor.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — The biopharmaceutical maker Swedish Orphan Biovitrum said on Monday that it had received a preliminary takeover offer from an unnamed suitor.

headline.main: Sobi, Swedish Maker of Drugs for Rare Diseases, Receives Takeover Bid
